1553150.name: Anima Reaver
1553150.description:
Anima Reaver is a 3D Sci-Fi spaceship shooter focused on cooperative gameplay. The objective of the game is to destroy big flagships and bases with a group of players to progress. The game is organized as missions with various objectives (including optional objectives) that unlock new missions to progress through the storyline.

Gameplay


Fight against huge flagships and bases with your friends, play online or local multiplayer with splitscreen! Unlock new additions to your spaceships by completing missions and challenges.

Story


Thousands of years ago there was war between the nations,
Above all stood the Phenix Empire, seeking power to dominate the world.
Then, the Rhaen Alliance was created, they fought for freedom and justice.
But one man ended it all, tired of humanity’s greed, he used his power to destroy everything.
Humanity is now gone, perished in the hands of one man, the enemy of mankind.
Yet, a single soul still echoes in the void, hidden in eternal sleep, sealed in the dark.

Enter a world in the brink of destruction, as the last living being you will determine the fate of the world through your actions. Learn the truth of this post-apocalyptic world and discover its hidden secrets.
